data.title: Pooja Sharma (Mahakali) Lifestyle, Net Worth, House, Car, Family, Career, and Biography 2017
data.meta_description:
Pooja Sharma (Mahakali) Lifestyle, Net Worth, House, Car, Family, Career, and Biography 2017

Pooja Sharma is an Indian model and television actor
Born on 12 12 July 1989 New Delhi, India

Height (approx.)in centimeters- 170 cm
in meters- 1.70 m
in feet inches- 5’ 7”Weight (approx.)in kilograms-55 kg
in pounds- 121 lbs
Figure Measurements33-28-33

Famous RoleDraupadi in TV serial 'Mahabharat' 
Mahakali in 'Mahakali– Anth hi Aarambh hai

Family: Suresh sharma

Career
Pooja sharma was the top 10 finalists in Femina Miss India 2006
she was selected for a sports-based talk show in Doordarshan,

After some time, in 2007 she was selected as an anchor for Page 3 on zoom
She had also worked with Ranbir Kapoor for a Pepsi tvc.Later she walked the ramp. 

Sharma made her acting debut from Star PlusTeri Meri Love Stories with Karan Kundra in 2012
In 2013 She was seen playing the role of Draupadi in the mythological serials ‘Mahabharat’ on Star Plus

Currently, she is seen in Colors’ show Mahakali – Anth hi Aarambh hai.

Television -
Teri Meri Love Stories (2012), Mahabharat (2013-2014), Ajab Gajab Ghar Jamai (2014), Dosti...Yaariyan...Manmarziyan (2015), Mahakali (2017)

Awards - Star Parivaar Awards (2014)

Hobbies - Modelling, Travelling and Dancing

Favourite Things:-
Favourite Food"
Chinese cuisine
Favourite Film:
Gandhi
Favourite Books:
The Power by Rhonda Byrne, The Secret by Rhonda Byrne
Favourite Writers
Bulleh Shah, Gulzar

Disclaimer 
All the information provided is based on internet research.
We do now claim or guarantee any informatons is 100% correct

Career:

Pooja sharma was the top 10 finalists in Femina Miss India 2006

She was selected for a sports-based talk show in Doordarshan,

After some time, in 2007 she was selected as an anchor for Page 3 on zoom

She had also worked with Ranbir Kapoor for a Pepsi tvc.Later she walked the ramp.

Sharma made her acting debut from Star PlusTeri Meri Love Stories with Karan Kundra in 2012

In 2013 She was seen playing the role of Draupadi in the mythological serials ‘Mahabharat’ on Star Plus

Currently, she is seen in Colors’ show Mahakali – Anth hi Aarambh hai.

Television -

Teri Meri Love Stories (2012), Mahabharat (2013-2014), Ajab Gajab Ghar Jamai (2014), Dosti...Yaariyan...Manmarziyan (2015), Mahakali (2017)

Awards - Star Parivaar Awards (2014)
